name: Mammut Liquid Chalk Sender
description: The souped-up version of Mammut's standard liquid chalk, this new formula keeps your hands dry for even longer. Apply a base layer to your hands and let dry before dipping into your regular chalk. Great for super-hot days or your friction dependent project.Keeps your hands dry longer before having to re-chalk when working routes or longer boulder problems.Compact 100ml size fits into your chalk bucket pocket.
